name: Kenji
description: You can hang out with Kenji on Tuesday, Thursday and Friday. He's located in your classroom
ranks: Rank 2: Say "No/That's a secret" > I like older women/I like them all
Rank 3: Say "What, life?" > Go for it
Rank 6: Say anything > I have 30-year goals
Rank 7: Ask what's wrong > Bride-To-Be Magazine > That's great. Congrats!
Rank 8: Say "Are you in trouble?" > You should go with her/You should talk to her
unlocks: For completing this social link you can fuse Surt who has the unique spell Ragnarok, in a normal or triangle fusion.
